ChestSMInclineBenchPress.name: Smith Incline Bench Press
ChestSMInclineBenchPress.preparation: Lie supine on incline bench with upper chest under bar. Grasp bar with wide oblique overhand grip. Disengage bar by rotating bar back.
ChestSMInclineBenchPress.execution: Lower weight to upper chest. Press bar until arms are extended. Repeat.
ChestSMInclineBenchPress.comments: Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide. Also see Bench Press Analysis.
